sentences.en: A police car bumped down the track.
sentences.cn: 一辆警车颠簸着行驶在小路上。

sentences.en: Actually, let's just read this little bit where you've made them bump into each other.
sentences.cn: 这样吧，我们就只读你让他们偶遇这一小段吧。

sentences.en: Add pasta to your salads to bump up your fibre intake.
sentences.cn: 在色拉中加入意大利面条，增加你的纤维摄入量。

sentences.en: Company bosses have come back down to earth with a bump after a period of post-election euphoria.
sentences.cn: 公司老板们在经历了一段选举过后的兴奋之后，重又回到现实中来。

sentences.en: He had a few injuries, mostly bumps and bruises.
sentences.cn: 他有几处受了伤，大都是肿块和瘀青。

sentences.en: I felt a little bump and I knew instantly what had happened.
sentences.cn: 我感觉到一点儿轻微的碰撞，便立刻意识到发生了什么。

sentences.en: I happened to bump into Mervyn Johns in the hallway.
sentences.cn: 我在走廊里意外碰见了默文·约翰斯。

sentences.en: I heard a bump in the next room.
sentences.cn: 我听到隔壁房间传来“砰”的一声.

sentences.en: I often bump into him at the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 我经常在超级市场同他不期而遇

sentences.en: I tried to avoid her, but it was just my luck to bump into her.
sentences.cn: 我不想见她, 偏撞上她了.

sentences.en: Joanna heard him bump into the table and curse again.
sentences.cn: 乔安娜听见他撞到了桌子上，又骂骂咧咧的。

sentences.en: She bumped her head against a low branch.
sentences.cn: 她的头撞到一根低矮的树枝上。

sentences.en: She fell against our coffee table and got a large bump on her forehead.
sentences.cn: 她倒地时撞到我们的咖啡桌上，额头起了个大包。

sentences.en: She has a bump on the back of her head.
sentences.cn: 她的后脑勺上肿起了一块。

sentences.en: She tripped over the bump on the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 她被人行道上一块隆起的地面绊了一下.

sentences.en: Small children often cry after a minor bump.
sentences.cn: 小孩子常常是稍微磕碰一下就哭。

sentences.en: The child took five steps, and then sat down with a bump.
sentences.cn: 小孩走了5步，接着扑通一声坐到了地上。

sentences.en: the economy was still bumping along the bottom.
sentences.cn: 经济形势仍然低迷。

sentences.en: The extra cost will bump up the price.
sentences.cn: 额外的成本会使价格猛涨。

sentences.en: the hotel may well bump up the bill.
sentences.cn: 旅馆可能多开账。

sentences.en: The roof was so low he bumped his head (=  his head hit the roof  ) .
sentences.cn: 屋顶很低，他都碰到头了。

sentences.en: the scandal brought them down to earth &B{with a bump}.
sentences.cn: 丑闻让他们一下子从幻想中清醒过来。

sentences.en: The truck hit a bump and bounced.
sentences.cn: 卡车开过路面上的隆起处，颠了一下。

sentences.en: They stopped walking and he almost bumped into them.
sentences.cn: 他们停下了脚步，这下他几乎撞到他们。

sentences.en: They will probably bump you off anyway!
sentences.cn: 不管怎样他们很可能会干掉你！

phrases.tran_cn: 凹凸贴图；凸凹处理；凹凸映射

trans.tran_en: an area of skin that is raised because you have hit it on something
to move up and down as you move forward, especially in a vehicle
to hit or knock against something
